snippet: Jennifer Granholm, the former Michigan governor, was on "The Dating Game" in 1978, and YouTube has immortalized her 19-year-old self.
abstract: Jennifer Granholm, the former Michigan governor, was on "The Dating Game" in 1978, and YouTube has immortalized her 19-year-old self.

headline.main: Granholm and Her Curls on 'The Dating Game'
headline.print_headline: That '70s hair: Ex-Governor’s Turn On a Game Show
